main.docTitle: Revenue (Variation and Reduction of Fees and Charges) Order 2002

subsection.content: Section 3 shall apply to fees payable in respect of business registration certificates and branch registration certificates which commence on or after 1 April 2002 and before 1 April 2003.
Sections 4, 5 and 6 shall apply to charges payable in respect of the period commencing on 1 April 2002 and ending on 31 March 2003.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Waiver of business registration fees, etc.

subsection.content: The prescribed business registration fee and the prescribed branch registration fee as defined in section 2 of the Business Registration Ordinance (Cap. 310) shall be waived in accordance with this section.
Where the fee prescribed in item 1(l)(i) or (ii) of Schedule 1 to that Ordinance is payable, a sum of $2,000 shall be waived.
Where the fee prescribed in item 2(a) or (b) of Schedule 2 to that Ordinance is payable, a sum of $73 shall be waived.

subsection.leadIn: Subject to subsections (2) and (3), the amount of charge payable for the supply of fresh water pursuant to regulation 46 of the Waterworks Regulations (Cap. 102 sub. leg. A) shall be reduced by deducting from the charge—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: in the case of a charge under item 1(a), (d), (e) or (f) in Part 3 of Schedule 1 to those Regulations, an amount not exceeding $3,200;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: in the case of a charge under item 1(b) or (c) in Part 3 of Schedule 1 to those Regulations, an amount not exceeding $800.

subsection.content: Notwithstanding subsections (2) and (3), any remainder of the amount allowed to be deducted in respect of a bill of charges which is not utilized in the payment of that bill shall be carried forward and set off against the charges payable in the subsequent bill of charges.

subsection.leadIn: Subject to subsections (2) and (3), the amount of sewage charge payable pursuant to section 2 of the Sewage Services (Sewage Charge) Regulation (Cap. 463 sub. leg. A) shall be reduced by deducting from the charge—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: where the rate for the charge is based on the volume of water supplied for the purposes specified in item 1(a), (d), (e) or (f) in Part 3 of Schedule 1 to the Waterworks Regulations (Cap. 102 sub. leg. A), an amount not exceeding $800;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: where the rate for the charge is based on the volume of water supplied for the purposes specified in item 1(b) in Part 3 of Schedule 1 to the Waterworks Regulations (Cap. 102 sub. leg. A), an amount not exceeding $200.

section.name: s6
section.heading: Reduction of trade effluent surcharges
section.content: The amount of trade effluent surcharge payable pursuant to sections 3 and 4 of the Sewage Services (Trade Effluent Surcharge) Regulation (Cap. 463 sub. leg. B) shall be reduced by 30%.
